section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The contract states that the purpose of the venture is IT development, but then states that this may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc. This creates an ambiguity on the actual purpose of the venture as it may change. It also gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. sole power to change this.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: The contract states that the duties of members may be amended from time to time. However, it is not explicitly defined how the decision of members is decided. It then states that if the members' interests are affected, it must be unanimous. This causes confusion about how the member decisions are voted on.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: The contract states that this agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc, notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go. Giving BorrowMoney.com the sole consent to change the agreement goes against what a Joint Venture is supposed to be as it implies that they are not of equal standing.
